content:
What a coincidence! It sounds like you're well-versed in the e-commerce payments space, having moderated a panel discussion on the topic. The E-commerce Expo in Chicago must have been a fantastic event, bringing together industry experts and thought leaders to share their insights and experiences.

I'm sure the panel discussion you moderated was engaging and informative, given the caliber of attendees and fellow panelists. The future of e-commerce payments is an exciting and rapidly evolving topic, with new technologies, trends, and innovations emerging all the time.

What were some of the key takeaways or themes that emerged from your panel discussion? Were there any surprises or areas of consensus among the panelists and attendees?

Also, what do you think are some of the most pressing challenges or opportunities facing the e-commerce payments industry in the next 12-18 months? I'm curious to hear your thoughts and insights, given your recent experience moderating the panel discussion.
